list.title: E-Service Catalog
list.description: In this area you can explore all the catalog's e-services

tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs for e-service details and load estimate as stated by the Subscribers

alert.youAreTheProvider: You are the provider of this e-service
alert.missingCertifiedAttributes: Your party is missing at least one of the certified attributes required to subscribe this e-service
alert.alreadySubscribed: You can't subscribe again as you are already a Subscriber of this e-service
alert.hasDraft: You already have an agreement draft for this e-service

versionInformations.title: Informazioni di versione
versionInformations.audienceDescription: The audience that the subscriber must register in the voucher to identify the service
versionInformations.doubtsQuestion: Do you have doubts about the implementation to deliver your e-service?

voucherVerification.title: Voucher verification
voucherVerification.description: Devi verificare un voucher ricevuto da un fruitore? Di seguito i link con le istruzioni necessarie
voucherVerification.howLink: How do I verify a voucher?

certified.description: Questi attributi sono certificati da una fonte autoritativa riconosciuta, e non necessitano di ulteriori certificazioni.

verified.description: Questi attributi necessitano verifica da parte di almeno un erogatore. Potresti già possederne alcuni (o tutti).

declared.description: Devi dichiarare sotto la tua responsabilità di possedere questi attributi.

tableEServiceCatalog.missingCertifiedAttributes: Your party does not meet the list of required certificated attributes
